DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter, randomized, double-blind, active-controlled, phase III clinical trial to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Dp-R206 and Bonviva for 16 weeks once a month on the improvement of vitamin D in postmenopausal women with osteoporosis.
DOC.brief_title: Phase III Clinical Trial of DP-R206 and Bonvia In Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Female more than 40 years old in postmenopausal Subject who has a history of malignant cancer
